## DocExtensionOptions interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface DocExtensionOptions extends NodeExtensionOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [content](./core.docextensionoptions.content.md) | <code>string</code> | Adjust the content allowed in this prosemirror document.<!-- -->This will alter the schema if changed after initialization and can cause errors. It should only be set \*\*once\*\* per editor. |
